title: 128B.02 TERMS OF OFFICERS; ELECTIONS; VOTING.
text:
The term of an officer of the Indian Education Committee is three years.
The election of committee officers must be held according to section 123B.94.
A qualified voter who resides within former Independent School District No. 25 may vote at an election of committee officers.
This chapter does not prohibit a qualified voter who resides within former Independent School District No. 25 from voting in an election in Independent School District No. 309.
